poster: B E L 1 E V E
title: Looking For Players For Ranked Team All Welcome
body:
Hey everyone, 

We are looking for team members that want to form a team and play ranked teams.
Bronze to Gold any roll we want you.
We play all the time and are non raging easy going =]

Add me in game B E L 1 E V E

replies.body: can play all roles but adc main supp and top though

Ign: Scopez
Role: Top rengar, most other top laners and perform well in jg
Rank: Gold V (Promos currently to GIV)

ign: opportunist nz
role: top , adc pref can play any tho
can skype and am i most days
